title: Please get rid of Flex Queue on OCE otherwise you see stuff like this:
body:
I've seen all types of elo ranges on both my team/enemy team from B1 all the way to challenger. it's clear that OCE is a pretty dead region and cannot support flex queue. Getting rid of this queue in our region will probably help improve solo queue as well.

http://imgur.com/a/zfXbP

replies.body: Flex is literally worse than dynamic queue in terms of health when applied in our region. The region is simply too dead to properly support the queue for anything other than a 2-3+ tier difference of clown fiesta draft.
I mean, you say that but it just goes to prove even more how our server simply cannot support a balanced flex rank queue. May as well call it "draft mode"

so play solo/duo, tt, normals or aram, plenty  options.

if your queuing up for flex as a solo player your just asking for trouble.

Teamwork is a skill too, and dragging teamwork out of 5 solos is a lot harder than out of a cohesive 5 man team. Solo/duo and flex involve different skills and mindsets, so it's not all that farfetched for there to be a significant skill/rank disparity there.

It's worth remembering though that your opinion is only one of many. If I were to remove either queue it would be solo/duo, because at it's core League is a team game, and if people aren't willing to capitalise on that teamwork skill then that's their choice to take that disadvantage.
He's right, League is a team game so removing the "team queue" would be stupid

Have you considered the possibility that the "rank disparity" which appears may be linked to the way the rank reset was applied? 

As someone who was placed in Plat 1 in Solo and Gold 3 in Flex, it makes sense that I am placed into games with and against other Gold Flex players regardless of my Solo rank. Admittedly, when I check op.gg I see a fruit salad of Solo/Duo ranks in my Flex games, as those are what are displayed, but upon further inspection the Flex ranks are quite close. Also, the queue times I've experienced as a solo player have been hardly notable and are often quick, which makes me hesitant to claim poor queue health. 

Perhaps a worthwhile point of discussion could be how similar Solo/Duo and Flex should have been upon initial placement (which I have no definitive answer for).

The point of flex Q is for people to play as teams.
Not another SoloQ.
Yes but our region is too dead to actually support it. look at the rank disparities when playing

Seems not, if it was dead then it would be like dominion, or the fact that TT isn't up all the time.
Those we can't support.

The player base on this is split 40/60.
Because now Ranked teams are no more, and only exist through Flex.
But now solo people can Q up to join a random "Team"
I'm bronze and was in a plat one until they got a silver...... Not gonna confirm or deny if it was this one.

No I like flex que:
Because when I get gold (phh I'm never getting gold) I can play with my bronze friends.

Flex and S/D are separate but you are still excluded from playing with friends based on your rank bracket, but then you queue and get 3 bronze matched with a couple of multi season golds. So golds get matched with bronze but golds cant queue with bronze. Does that seem crazy to anyone else? 

Perhaps having a queue health indicator would help people to know if they want to join a queue. Like lots of games have a population indicator so you can see this server is almost empty and this one is almost full. Once you have gone to the effort of finding a couple more mates to fill out a 5 man and then queued up and waited for 20 mins for a game which then turns out to be pretty unbalanced, kind of ruins it. 

A team game with no voice comms built in is always going to have problems imo.
